summary: This mod prevents people from commenting on your nakedness if they are naked themselves. Which was a minor annoyance in the vanilla game.
descriptionHtml: This mod prevents people from commenting on your nakedness if they are naked themselves. Which was a minor annoyance in the vanilla game. Skyrim NPCs consider you naked if you are not wearing any chest equipment. This is my first Skyrim mod and I decided to start with something simple. If you want a mod that eliminates naked comments altogether, I highly recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13050/]No Naked Comments[/url].
author: TorchicBlaziken
